Esta muy bien, es diferente y divertido. Del genero de 1 vs all al estilo thriller es el mejor que hay de momento. Faltan algunos retoques porque el balance entre survivors y killers a veces flojea en cuanto a conceptos (no que haya personajes OP, a lo sumo menos mejores), cosas como la escotilla y las puertas de salida deberian tener alguna condicion para evitar tantos campeos al lado solo para hacerte t-bag y no terminar la partida. Los developers escuchan y solucionan a menudo asi que solo puede ir cuesta arriba el juego
STOP LAUNCHING NEW ASSASSIN'S AND REPAIR THE GAME BEFORE HE DIES !!!

Before I get into this shit lemme just say; I fucking love this game. Look at my icon. If you edgy like this hoe then you're gonna love this game. Trust ya girl. 

Graphics: 7
Music: 10
Cinematics: 8
Story: 4
Content: 8
Controls: 9
Gameplay: 9

Alright; as far as graphics go the game is relatively pretty. It sets up a very spooky atmosphere and you can get pretty immursed if you want. Prior I would say some of the animations are meh, but for lack of a better term the devs have done "A a pretty good job so far." At the Halloween event they provided some very gorgeous cosmetics and the killers and their mori (killing animations) are getting better and better.

As for music. Let me tell you. The music, is so fukkin' good. I have the sountrack on my phone. If any of y'all do art play this shit, you will feel so fucking hype. Anyways, kudos to the composers cause they really bring it to the game. It's exciting, enticing and really gets your heart pounding. Much loves. <3

Cinematics; Alright. As an animation student I can't say the cinematics are ground breaking. They're certainly not on the level of League or any of the other big dogs BUT, they absolutely do the trick. I am refering mostly to the killer reveals. The opening animation to the game is gorgeous; and wowow Trapper is daddy. Anyways, much love to the game's animators y'all are doing gods work. 

Story; Mkay. This is an assymetrical horror game, that doesn't really deliver much in the story department. The lore is unqiue and cool but you really only get a taste of it. The Hallowed Blight event was however a very nice preview of what's (hopefully) to come. And if the game introduced a single player story mode, I would probabaly have a heart attack and die form joy. But yes, as it stands, not a whole lot going on there. Here's hoping we get some more in the future ;)

Content: Overall you get some decent stuff. While it leans towards in you buying their in game currency you still have a number of killers and survivor dudes to choose form. And if you live the grind life you can unlock them all with Irridescent Shards. You can also use this to get some funky cosmetics which look quite lovely, I gotta say. 

Controls: Pretty standard stuff, W, A, S, D to move and left crtl to crouch. You can't jump so if you have a tick to press spacebar randomly I'm sorry but it won't do anything my dudes. Killers each have a unique ability that takes a bit to learn but it geerally uses the same keys. Simple stuff, nothing groundbreaking.

Gameplay; The general goal is to do five generators and then escape through the gates. You can also do totems and the like but they're a little less important. It's a little more spicy for those who choose killer but nothing too whack. I do wish there was am little more that had doing, but overall the fear of the chase is what keeps it interesting. 

In general it's a really addicting with a community that I could best express as mixed. Much like overwatch you will get a lot of toxic players, hackers and general turds who make it their prime goal to fuck with you. 
But c'est la vie (that's life.) In the same stride I have met probabaly 2/3 of my steam friends through this game. Surpise bitches, if you're nice people are nice back. So spread a little love. <3

To end this note; the devs have taken the game to a whole new level and I'm very much looking forwad to what they do next. So take form this what you like but this game is going places. ;)

Injugable, cada actualizacion o contenido nuevo que introducen  le meten 50 bugs mas, a cada paso una cagada hacen. La comunidad es de lo peor, Campers y tuneleros a mas no poder con los killers o los Survivors "Trolls" y la empresa no penaliza ni a los que abandonan las partidas. Muy buen juego, con una buena idea planteada, pero a manos de unos inutiles lamentablemente. Ahora el juego se crashea y la culpa la tiene el usuario y lo penalizan, por que lo toman como una "Desconección" por favor que empresa ridicula, lo manejan payasos o que? Una verguenza.

As it stands now I cannot recommend this game, BHVR is burying their head in the sand regarding criticism and continue to prove their inept nature and understanding of their own game. With crazy changes like the billy cooldown mechanic, or boons. and not to mention censoring their own forums and the content creator DOWSEY being stripped of his community status, I cannot and will not support this game. Not until BHVR smartens up, this game used to be fun but not anymore.
I played it a little bit, it's ok.

Капкано-разрывательная игра 10 из 10!

É pouco enjoativo, extramente atmosférico, misturando o gênero terror e ação de uma forma absurdamente boa. Também dá pra jogar durante inúmeras horas sem se entediar. É um bom jogo pra você que quer se divertir com os amigos. O jogo é constantemente atualizado, sempre com personagens novos com uma variedade muito bom tanto de assassino como de sobrevivente. 

 Porém, o jogo possuí várias falhas, começando pela falta de balanceamento que torna o jogo no início muito frustante  pra quem quer jogar de sobrevivente ou assassino. A comunidade do jogo também não é nada boa, totalmente tóxica. Mesmo assim, a Behavior continua trabalhando no balanceamento do jogo e correções, o que faz acreditar que esses problemas serão corrigidos eventualmente.

Recentemente a Behavior finalmente balanceou o jogo, até o momento o resultado disso foi positivo e desencoraja players a tryhardar demais ou serem tóxicos, já que o jogo exige mais habilidade. Vamos ver se isso vai durar.
Jogo muito divertido quando se joga com amigos!

After a lot of thought, I've decided to review this game, mostly because Steam asked me to and I get a badge so that's p neat ig. 

Pros - 
-Constant [strike] bugs [/strike] updates
-Fan favourite characters brought to life with care
-Decent graphics
-Potential for hours of fun

Cons - 
-Toxic community (there's some no-toxic people out there... somewhere)
-Dev's used to have a difficult time communicating with the player base (Mcote) they've kinda fixed it now
-Balanced gameplay difficulties (ongoing)
-Auric cells (of course I have bought them but I will always sin paid in-game currency, even if it doesn't encourage pay-to-win)

Overall it's a p neat game, just don't get too attached, I learnt the hard way.

ALSO WHY HAVE I SPENT SO MUCH ON THIS GAME (including getting the exclusives, help me, I'll get golden feng min one day)

A lot of fun. With friends. Without friends it cannot be a little frustrating at times, especially when you're new at the game. One of the best features of DBD and part of what makes it stand out is that you can play both the killer and the survivor. If you ever grow weary of playing one side, you can always go try out the other side.
Like I mentioned earlier, there is a rather large and noticeable learning curve which may cause a lot of frustrations. Once you get past that and get some decent perks to mess around with, DBD is a lot of fun with each game being unique from the other.
